attributes.action: Petition Govt  to have all goods made in occupied Palestine clearly labelled.
attributes.background: Israeli settlers are aggressively stealing what remains of Palestinian land and then farming produce that makes its way to the British market. We have the right in the UK to choose not to buy such goods. They must be clearly labelled.

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/113149
